website_summaries.verdict: Slightly smaller blender bottle than some other options, but it works great for those who don't need a large bottle.
pros: Includes a metal mixer ball that thoroughly combines your drink's ingredients
Has a tight cap on the shaker bottle that ensures it won't leak during shaking
Bottles contain dishwasher-safe materials that will hold up a long time
cons: Has a maximum capacity of only 20 oz., so its size is below average

customer_reviews.title: decent price for 2 and the ball works great. Just not the full truth on the size ...
customer_reviews.text: 20 oz is misleading. the cups can hold 20oz if you fill the liquid with the lid on. Top oz marker is 12 oz, then you can assume 16 would get you to the rim, and 20 would be in the lid. If you open and close the lid between drinks, it will drip on the top of the cup and leak down. decent price for 2 and the ball works great. Just not the full truth on the size and the leaking issue.
customer_reviews.author: TOM.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to read measurements
customer_reviews.text: Both of the bottles I received are dark colored -- not just the top but the entire bottle. They are so dark that it is impossible to read the markings on the side -- the ones you're supposed to use for measuring. Even if you hold the bottle up to a window, the marks can't be seen. Not what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: blending function works very well.
customer_reviews.text: just got these, so don't know durability etc. ; blending is easy and complete. The only complaint I have is that the flip top on the lid is so tight that I have to use a screwdriver to pry it open, and a LOT of pressure to get it completely closed. The first time I used one, I shook the shake all over the kitchen. I use mine at home so tools are handy, and I now know to check that the flip top is completely closed. I will probably continue to just unscrew the top and leave the flip top permanently closed.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of what combo you select to purchase, colors won't match it.
customer_reviews.text: I understand that colors may vary, but why are there 5 options to select from of different colors if you are just going to get whatever they want to send? Just make one, clear you will get whatever color they feel like throwing in the box. There are multiple options to pick from, so it makes no sense. I assumed if I was paying more for a selection, it was because I could guarantee the colors were that option. Nope. They work fine and I wanted "smaller" ones for my kids, but it is still misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie771

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 2 basic everyday use bottles
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 2 basic everyday use bottles. I've used these for iced matcha tea, detox blends, protein powders, and bulletproof coffee. They are a perfect size for most drinks and allow you to mix things at work or on the go. Wide mouth for putting in ingredients and cleaning. The blending ball included does a fantastic job. No lumps or chunks! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Pr0n_Queen

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love these smaller Blender Bottles. They are perfect for an after workout protein shake. I've always had bigger ones that get in the way and are generally to big for my purpose. I don't need a super big gulp sized shaker bottle to get my protein or preworkout. These fit everywhere. These are easy to clean and will last a long time. I'd highly recommend these! I've already recommend them to all my gym buddies as they all have the bigger version and were highly interested in the smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment for the Gym
customer_reviews.text: These are convenient shaker bottles for throwing in your gym bag and mixing up a pre-workout mix, if you're like me and don't need a huge bottle. The two pack is great because you can use the other for a post-workout protein mix shake and don't need to wash the first one. If anyone has used them before, they're a pain to clean at the gym. These work great! I would recommend washing them ASAP though with a toothbrush or something to get in the fine threads. I also use this size to make ranch dressing and they're the perfect size and easily stored.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you pick the right colors
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this product is that it says “colors may vary” and shows only clear bottles, but I got a black bottle which makes it extremely difficult to se the water markings. Had I known that the colors included non-clear ones, I probably would’ve spent the extra few dollars to get guaranteed clear bottles. It’s a small issue I know, but when you’re trying to fill 8oz and can’t tell where the line is or where the water is, it gets rather annoying. Great bottles though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Werner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for sports supplements or other mixes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She takes a powdered prebiotic every morning that she has to mix with water. She was having trouble getting it to dissolve using a glass and spoon. Cleaning th blender daily was a pain. The lids on these seal very well, no leaks. The metal ball works like a whisk. Just close and shake and it mixes everything extremely well. Dishwasher safe, so cleaning is easy. She absolutely loves them. My daughter uses them to make chocolate milk.
customer_reviews.author: HuntandFishVATop Contributor: Beekeeping

customer_reviews.title: Blender bottles get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using blender bottles for years, and it's nice to have a rotation of 5 or 6 in case you forget to wash your dishes. I like this size better than the larger, I just use it for protein shakes and can always add more water to it. This size fits well in any free gym locker I've used as well.
customer_reviews.author: Billy K

customer_reviews.title: Nice but short......
customer_reviews.text: Be aware the hold just right at a whole bottle of water. I thought they would be taller but still a good price to add extra shake bottles to your work gym bag. They are sturdy and did come with everything advertised. Due to the size and that they can't hold much water, I have to drink all my workout shakes separately which is ok since i didn't pay much for the bottles. In all I would recommend to others. I like to workout so it's nice to have extra bottles around but if you want to take all of your supplements at once then I would look into getting a larger one
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect blending cups for protein shakes
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and does a great job of blending my protein powder beverages. The bottles are also easy to clean. My only problem is that the pop-up top for the mouth piece doesn't close easily. I find I have to press down hard a few times to get it to close all the way before I shake my drink. Other than that, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: The product description is entirely inaccurate. We ordered a black and a blue we ended up with two blues and neither one of them have a clear bottom they’re both blue shading. In addition to that, it says in the description that the 20 ounce bottles but they only measure up to 12 ounces I find it hard to believe that you can fit an extra 8 ounces in the cap of the blender bottle!
customer_reviews.author: mama14

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying These!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great shakers. I imagine they will last a very long time. Very sturdy. Easy to clean. No leaking. Blends very well. I use protein powder, peanut butter powder, unsweetened almond milk and ice cubes in with the ball. This bottle works perfectly! I love having two also. I make up one shake for breakfast and take the other with me for lunch!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I didn’t get these sooner. Somehow I thought I could tough out just stirring my protein shakes, but always end up with clumps. I was looking for small shaker cups, and the top line on these is 12oz, but the bottom of the bottle says 20oz (probably it’s max capacity, but you don’t want to fill it to the brim). I read the other reviews, and purchased it knowing that and am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: 5-star! Reviewing a Blender Bottle?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's a little odd I'm compelled to write a review for a blender bottle but this product is such a good value, exactly as described with really good quality, that I wanted to share to help others as I looked at 5 different products before choosing this one. I have a powdered supplement that would not stay completely mixed in water when I used a spoon. This blender bottle is perfect...I just give it a little shake every few drinks....and, like they advertised, it does not leak at all! Nice to get a quality/value product that does exactly what it says!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The Blender Bottles work as advertised. I use them to mix my protein powder with milk at work. The protein powder directions say to drink the protein mix within 10 minutes of mixing. I put a cup of milk in the bottle and bring my protein powder separately to work. At the point I am ready to drink the protein powder mix, I put in the mixing ball and the protein powder and shake--the powder fully mixes with the milk. The lid fits tight--no leaks. I only mix 1 cup of milk with one scoop of protein powder. If you mix two cups of your preferred liquid, I would recommend getting the larger Blender Bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Works great for mixing "normal" size shakes and drinks
customer_reviews.text: The 12 oz. capacity of these blender bottles are just what I wanted. The are much more practical for me than the 32, 24, and even 20 oz. blender bottles that I found in stores. One also fits well in a "lunch box size" cooler to be available after workouts. I'm happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: The screw-on lid has a stopper that is tight and doesn't leak (so far). The spout was hard to snap shut and open the first time, and has proven not to leak when shaking. It has an indent that you can hold your finger to make sure it stays shut just for safety. The ball mixer is collapsible making clean-up a breeze and does a great job mixing powders.
customer_reviews.author: Repeat Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I love Blender Bottles but these stops are so hard to close. You have to really push down on them. Then they are hard to open. These tops won’t last long for me.
customer_reviews.author: dancermommd

customer_reviews.title: I am way too lazy to drag out a blender every time I want to mix a shake.Problem solved with these cups.
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are great. I have had several over the years. The ball blends protein powder awesomely and will even distribute thicker things like peanut butter and yogurt. It's easy to clean, the lid seals tightly, and it has a little loop for a clip for if you want to hang it off your person for some reason. I will say that if you leave it unwashed and sealed and the protein mix you have goes off a little, the funky smell will linger in the cup, but this is easy to fix with 1 part white vinegar to 3 parts water which you then let stand overnight. Funk begone!
customer_reviews.author: Emtyy

customer_reviews.title: Good size and quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shaker bottles. Just the right size. I had to replace one that fell on the floor and cracked, but I feel that these are reasonably sturdy. Other than it cracking the bottle looked brand new after being in use for two plus years.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to clean and wash, definitely leak proof, and does a great job mixing up protein shakes. That said, there's a piece on the top that opens to let you drink, and I think that can be a little too hard to open at times. A minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shakers
customer_reviews.text: The little steel balls help mix up your protein shake very well. Only thing I don't like is that it is smaller than I thought it would be. I think they count the volume under the lid as part of the total volume. Haven't actually measured it though so it may be an optical illusion. If I order any more, I will get the next larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Cordell C. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: This is not a 20 oz shaker
customer_reviews.text: My family loves the blender bottles. We use them for our protein shakes as well as a hydration tool. When I purchased these blender bottles, I did so under the impression that it is the same size (20oz) as the others we own. Do not let the headline fool you. This product is half the size of a typical blender bottle. It still is functional for protein shakes but the headline is misleading. I wish I would have read the reviews as they all clearly describe the same frustration that I am experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the bottle I was looking for. Smaller size meant I was forced to take a break during workouts to refill, wasn’t a bad thing because I could make myself rest a bit. The shaker hasn’t left me with any clumps, but I have only used it for preworkout so far, no protein powders. Hasn’t leaked even when tumbling around in my gym bag. Like the finger loop too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter from East Bay

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong colors
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups but only giving 3 stars because I wasn’t sent the correct colors which would be fine except I got one that’s black and you can’t see the inside of it which is annoying
customer_reviews.author: lofin

customer_reviews.title: Good shakers!
customer_reviews.text: I like these bottles. The size is a bit off from other cups the “same size.” So if you’re like me and you put all your blender bottles, lids and blender balls together you can’t fit standard lids on these bottles as they are a little bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Works Great (12oz practical)
customer_reviews.text: These actually only shake about 12oz of liquid as the additional liquid would have to be added through the lid. Works great if your planning on having 8oz or 12oz shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bingo !!
customer_reviews.text: No batteries, no leakage, no brainer. Had battery operated "spinner" mixer bottle which eventually died and was hard to clean thoroughly. The blender bottles either go in the dishwasher or can be cleaned by hand. Mixes powders well. Had them for about two weeks and will update if any problems. Oh.....I sharpie-marked the 8oz line, but, it's about half way up, so........
customer_reviews.author: ChaKoe

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and the price!
customer_reviews.text: A cheaper alternative to what health food stores are selling got mostly black and grey but totally worth it esspecially the size is fantastic! I like being able to keep it in my lunch so I can have a protein shake during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great size for my breakfast shake as the larger ones were too big for my needs. I have a few colors and switch the tops for color variation. Dishwasher safe(top rack) or just hand wash it makes little difference. The ball? It does mix,I just prefer chopped ice in mine to make it cold
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Leigh

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT YOU THINK
customer_reviews.text: NOT WHAT YOU THINK. It holds 20 oz if you fill it level to the top leaving no room to shake. It has markings on the side to 12 oz and a little space above that so functionally 12 oz. CAN'T USE IT FOR A 20 OZ DRINK
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Madill

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They have held up in the dishwasher (although I would be leery of putting the silver blending part in the dishwasher because I have had one get stuck). It doesn't take long to blend and easy to use. I liked them so much I recently purchased 2 additional ones!
customer_reviews.author: JAT

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've been carrying these bottles everywhere with me! Not just to work and to the gym, but on the road through the airports and conferences. Lightweight, durable, affordable, they have been perfect for water or protein shakes. Easy to wash too!
customer_reviews.author: Pancrat

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof blender bottles
customer_reviews.text: Purchase the set of 2 blender bottles to blend my morning shake. I've only used them twice but so far so good. I like that they are leak proof. Because I'm a bit of a klutz.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Clem

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love the smaller size blender bottles. I have a larger on and just found it to be too big. I am glad I found these. They are much easier to carry around and are just big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size for me!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller blender bottle since I travel and this is the perfect size. The description says “20oz.” But the lines only go up to 14, the remaining volume is if you filled the container including the cap. I typically mix my recover drink with 6-8oz of water so this is the perfect size! I selected the random colors for shipping and received the black and teal colored caps, I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Claremont

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I didn’t need the really large shakers and was happy I found these 20 ounce Blender Bottles at a good price for a 2 pack. I didn’t care which colors I got and I received a black one and a green one.
customer_reviews.author: Sta

customer_reviews.title: not 20 oz
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy shaker bottles. Not chintzy at all. They're really only 20 oz if you put the cap on and fill them to brimming through the cap. The top measurement line on the bottle is 400 ml which is like 14 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Blimense

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to mix a whey protein drink that I have for lunch. It works absolutely great. The top is tight and it mixes the whey powder thoroughly. Definitely a quality product that fully performs as advertised. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Fonger

customer_reviews.title: great bottles
customer_reviews.text: love these bottles. I gave 1 less star because I was sent different colors then I picked. Other then that, great bottles, good product, fast shipping !!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: bought this because I needed for a quick replacement. Really great quality for the price, can't go wrong with this purchase. I got a blue and black one.
customer_reviews.author: Regino Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love this absolutely perfect shaker blender bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. The shape fits my hand well and is not tall or top heavy. Love the mixer ball and the pop up top that any size straw fits or you can drink out of it. Also love the screw top. I guess that’s everything! I bought 4 and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Donakato

customer_reviews.title: Better than NutriSystem originals ...
customer_reviews.text: These have a nice loop on top for hooking to bike or backpack. Otherwise you can't tell difference between these and much more expensive Nutrisystem versions ... I like these very very much.
customer_reviews.author: JoelD

customer_reviews.title: Love this size!
customer_reviews.text: I don't make smoothies or add anything but water and protein powder to these bottles. They fit perfectly in my small gym bag. I am really glad I got these! I have the full size blender bottles too but they never get used because it's simply too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: lesleycchao

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice bottles this is the third time I've bought them. I got some for my wife and I and the ordered for my mother and mother-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: Randy D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. I’ve had cups like this before that either leak when shaken or the ball doesn’t mix well. These do not leakage all and mix completely. I love the smaller size also. Would definitely recommend. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MariaAna

customer_reviews.title: They were packaged nicely. TIP
customer_reviews.text: It is what it’s decribed to be. They were packaged nicely. TIP: Read and understand that colors may vary. I received two of the exact same bottles. They are really nice as most Blender Bottlea are but I was bummed yo get the same ones; I was hoping for two different bottles. All in all it’s good. Shipping & packaging was good, and description is correct!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: so I was glad that I could find two for the price of ...
customer_reviews.text: These shaker bottles are waaay overpriced in stores, so I was glad that I could find two for the price of one on amazon. Who likes using the same bottle every day? Having more than one is a must. My only gripe is it seems like they are hard to clean because I can never get the protein powder smell out of them, but it isn't anything crazy. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Standard Blender Bottles; just smaller
customer_reviews.text: Works great for smaller mixes instead of having to carry around the larger version. Dishwasher to clean and done.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: Would have like to have two clear ones like the photo. Color of the kids don’t matter to me. But clear bottles would have been nice as I had to have clear to send to school with my child. But it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm enjoying this container. It works great for those quick shakes in the morning and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J

customer_reviews.title: Cracked 1st time
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because it mixed great. I use Naked Whey and it doesn't mix well by hand because there is no lecithin in it. But very disappointed that the cup cracked after 1 use.....yes, 1 time. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Great colors!
customer_reviews.text: Protein shakes get so boring but now with these new colors, at least I’ll have something nice to drink from.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: These are perfectly sized!
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine how I lived without these before! I have the larger size, but all of my powders only require 8-12 ounces of liquid, so I wanted a smaller shaker bottle. These bottles are the perfect solution and I've been using them on the go. Super easy to clean and stow.
customer_reviews.author: victoria m

customer_reviews.title: Love these bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I have man of these bottles in the 28 and 32 ounce sizes, but I really like the compactness of the 20 ounce size. If everyone used them, billions of plastic bottles that end up in our landfills and oceans would be a thing of the past!
customer_reviews.author: Student of Art and Music

customer_reviews.title: This was a sweet deal for a pair of the smaller sized bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of blender bottles. This was a sweet deal for a pair of the smaller sized bottles - perfect for mixing a protein shake on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette H

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT HOLD 20oz!!! Not dishwasher safe!! Too small to use for even a half serving. Too many deep groove lips and edges to be able to be cleaned. They both self-destructed and broke while being washed. I bought two, used one of them once, and now they are both in the trash because they are both broken. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: They are just what I wanted. My only problem is that the pour spout is extremely hard to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa spring

customer_reviews.title: Good for shakes.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't leak and does the job. The cup does happen to "sweat" often. The condensation on this cup is more than other cups I've noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t see through the dark bottle
customer_reviews.text: While the description said colors may change, the only colored part was the top. Instead I received one light opaque bottle and one dark almost black bottle. You cannot see when your protein powder has been mixed in. I have to open it, stir it and then shake again. Not convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jdia16

customer_reviews.title: Blends well and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Good size shaker bottles for pre-workout and recovery formula. Some may prefer a bigger bottle for their protein shakes but I use this size and it works for me. It mixes the powders well and is simple to clean. Seals well also to avoid spills.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Exactly right size, use them every day
customer_reviews.text: I put my morning shake in one and take it to the gym; having two lets me put the used one in the washer at night and load up the clean one.
customer_reviews.author: E. Falken

customer_reviews.title: Good for protein shakes
customer_reviews.text: I love these they make mixing and transporting protein shakes super fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Starr G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my morning smoothies and tops do close securely (I haven't had any leaks). They are also big enough I can fill them with water when I take my dogs for a walk. I used the blender ball once just with whey protein and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Suzann98

customer_reviews.title: Can't see thru black bottle to see level.
customer_reviews.text: Good bottle shaker but i got two black bottles and can't see thru the sides to see how much level of liquid is in the bottle without taking the top off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time from vendor. Great quality and easy to clean. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna H

customer_reviews.title: Compact size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these before and I like the compact size. Easy to take to work
customer_reviews.author: ram

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised - colors did in fact vary
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected with one exception, the bottle that looks quite red in the photo is more of a two tone salmon kind of color. For what it’s worth the description did say “colors may vary.” Fortunately I’m secure enough in my masculinity to use it anyway, but some might not be.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and exactly what I was looking for. Great price, durable and came promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Cmzman

customer_reviews.title: I really like the widemouth because that makes it easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really like the widemouth because that makes it easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Balsick

customer_reviews.title: 50%good 50% not so good
customer_reviews.text: one Leaked one worked good ,wanted a replacement one but no way to get just 1 ,I would of had to mail back both ,no way for me to get to UPS location for return so no way to get refund ,,,I’m out the cost of one of them
customer_reviews.author: Irish Dave

customer_reviews.title: The best one out there!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, probably the best shaker bottle I have ever used. No leaks and breaks down easily for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cash

customer_reviews.title: Much more manageable
customer_reviews.text: Love these. The small ones are much more manageable. I use them for my lemon ACV water in the morning and my super greens shake.
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: Oats overnight
customer_reviews.text: Needed some sextets bottles for my overnight oats and these are perfect. I received black and red tops but it says colors are random.
customer_reviews.author: Tyfighter

customer_reviews.title: great for slimfast
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use for my slim fast and it works great! So glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: ldb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Slimmer design now fits perfectly in the car cup holder
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Work so well I was skeptical but loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Cocagne

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size bottle for the 10oz shakes my husband and I drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are not the best. The lid is extremely hard to open and close, if you are making a powdered shake all the powder gets stuck in the bottom around the edges. Other shake bottles I own do not do that. The description on Amazon also says 20 oz but they are not 20 oz. More like 12 oz. I will not buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well....
customer_reviews.text: Their good but I ordered red and black I got blue and black
customer_reviews.author: Johanna M Rebell

customer_reviews.title: Great shakers
customer_reviews.text: No problems with it so far and it's been a few months now. Use it for my meal replacement shakes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Warrick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These blender bottles are great! I am amazed how well they mix the ingredients together with just some shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Penel

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Tops don't close very well and top separated from the part that screws on so now I only have 1 useful one. These are poor quality and I don't recommend. I would recommend spending a little more and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boys for protein shakes. They love them. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: This is not a 20 oz bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my blender bottles last night. I was upset that they were supposed to be 20 ounce bottles, but the ones that I received were only 14-16 ounces at best. I highest mark on the cup is 12 ounces, and their is a little bit of room and then the top screws on. These are ok, but not what I thought that I was ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: What can I say they work pretty good! easy to wash nice having two of ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say they work pretty good! easy to wash nice having two of them so if one is dirty I can use the clean one. Don't leak just make sure you have the cap on tight otherwise you're going to get protein all over yourself

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shakers
customer_reviews.text: Great shaker bottles for making our own protein shakes. The top snaps super tight for no spilling or leaks. Easy to clean. Protein powder was getting stuck at bottom but if you tip it completely upside down after adding your liquid, the powder will fall into the liquid and combine appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rehbein

customer_reviews.title: SMALL BOTTLES
customer_reviews.text: These are 12oz bottles NOT 20oz bottles. Very disappointed because the description clearly says 20 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey D.

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Use these almost every day. Pieces washes well in the dishwasher and no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: needsmorebutter

customer_reviews.title: it mixes stuff
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever wanted to mix something up but a spoon just isn't cutting it? This product is for you. Great mixes on all my protein and pre-workout drinks. I like the more compact size too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Grave

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Got one for my girlfriend and myself. I love the smaller sized bottles and she does too. I know the colors may vary but I got the ones pictured. It’s a light navy blue and a dark navy blue. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nate V

customer_reviews.title: Super hard to close and open
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size and pretty sturdy....but super hard to open and close the top lid. I've hurt myself several times trying to jam it close or pry it open. I think there are better cups out there and somewhat regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L Treece

customer_reviews.title: Best to be found!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the benchmark for good quality, price, and mfg...
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Ross Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great value product
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and sturdiness. Also easy to clean and BPA free My favorite shaker bottles
customer_reviews.author: SinnerND

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It's a great deal. They work great and don't leak. I now have a total of 4 of these things and haven't had problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Love these for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Love these for on the go. I somehow keep managing to lose the balls though, so I have about 100 cups and one shaker ball.
customer_reviews.author: KayKay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, blends well and is easy to clean. Worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoJen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of these bottles. Great for protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindakay Christopherson

product_meta.title: Blender Bottle 2 Pack
product_meta.description: The BlenderBottle Classic 20-Ounce Shaker Cup makes it easy to maintain proper nutrition and hydration on-the-go. Featuring a patented mixing system—with a 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk (found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker cups) that moves freely inside the bottle to smooth out drink mixes and meal ingredients—it’s ideal for protein shakes, smoothies, fiber drinks, and meal replacements. It’s also a handy kitchen tool for mixing pancake batter, scrambled eggs, and salad dressings. The wide mouth makes it easy to add scoops of powdered mixes, meal ingredients, and liquids, and embossed markings show both ounces and milliliters for easy measuring anywhere. Bottle contents and liquids are securely contained thanks to a tightly threaded screw-on lid that creates a leakproof seal, and a flip cap that snaps securely shut for shaking and transportation. The convenient loop top makes it easy to carry the bottle and offers a place to attach car keys while at the gym. The BlenderBottle Classic 20-Ounce Shaker Bottle can also be used as a water bottle; the ball can be left inside, as it will never rust, chip, or peel. BPA and phthalate-free, dishwasher safe. Manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: 20-ounce capacity shaker cup for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, and supplements
Patented mixing system uses 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker bottles
Screw-on lid creates leak-proof seal, and flip cap snaps securely shut to keep contents contained; loop top for easy carrying or attaching keys
Wide mouth makes it easy to add mix scoops and liquids, and embossed markings measure both ounces and milliliters
BPA and phthalate-free, dishwasher safe; manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty
